title: Neon Night Girl-Biker
prompt: Fantasy scene in the style of cyberpunk: attractive girl-biker with long wavy hair, decorated with colors, sits on a futuristic motorcycle, we see her sexy huge hips and back, she wears a shiny helmet with a reflective visor, The tight-fitting suit, with elements of decorative armor and patterns highlighting the figure,  soft neon glow , creating an atmosphere of romantic fantasy world. The style of the image is a highly detailed fantasy illustration with elements of cyberpunk and glamour, with an emphasis on contrast between metallic and delicate floral details, background slightly blurred to emphasize the main character and her motorcycle. Use cinematic light, realistic proportions, high detail and deep shades to enhance the effect of magical and futuristic atmosphere.
